version_description:
Xeletiya qenal guharditina bi tilyare hat serrastkirin.
Parmakla kanal degistirirkenki hata duzeltildi.
Fixed channel changing via finger bug.
iOS 8.0 and upper version support and important bug fixes
App launching problems, ad improvements and minor bug fixes. Please update it.

[3.5.1] - Popup bug fixed.
[3.5] - App launching problems, ad improvements and minor bug fixes. Please update it.

Giringa li ser iPad'e hat serrastkirin.
iPad'teki sorun giderildi.
The problem in iPad has been fixed.

Giringa li ser hin iPad'e hat serrastkirin.
Bazi iPadlerdeki sorun giderildi.
The problem in some iPads has been fixed.

Advertisement issues and some bugs fixed.
Minimum iOS 8 and New iPhones support.

Hello from Hêvî TV v4!
- A complete new flat design!
- All new Apple's mobile devices are supported!
- Faster!
- Easy to use! Enjoy finger gestures!
- More fun!
